英文公告.附加說明: 1.To survey the qualification applicants will be taken place at 10:00A.M. on Feb/07/2011 in the meeting room of Administration Tourism Bureau. The proposal investigation, presentation, query and answer will be taken place at 10:00 A.M. on Feb/07/2011(see company evaluation stipulated for the date), each bid company is limited up to have 4 participants appeared. The first company polled will quote the bidden price. 2.Evaluation stipulates see the detailed in the tender document of"company evaluation stipulated". 3.The Design service funds is NTD8,325,000,The Construction Supervision funds is NTD6,460,000, the service fee is 8,325,000+6,460.000=14,780,000 N.T. dollars. The construction funds is NTD200,000,000. The budge service rate is 14,785,000/200,000,000=7.39%.
